landing_page.headline: Trade, borrow, and save using Dai.

trade_card.title: Trade
trade_card.description: Place orders in the Marketplace, or simply exchange your tokens instantly for what's available.

borrow_card.title: Borrow
borrow_card.description: Lock your tokens as collateral to generate Dai, a decentralized stablecoin soft-pegged to 1 USD.

save_card.title: Save
save_card.description: Earn savings on your Dai by locking it into Oasis Save. Automatic and non-custodial.

landing_page.section1_p: Oasis is a platform for decentralized finance. Use it to trade tokens, borrow Dai, and earn savings — all in one place.
landing_page.section2_p: Oasis is built on top of audited and formally verified smart contracts created by Maker, the industry leader in secure decentralized finance.
landing_page.section3_p: Oasis is a decentralized, non-custodial platform, accessible using an Ethereum-supported wallet. You—and only you—control your assets.
landing_page.answer1: Oasis is a decentralized application that runs on the Ethereum blockchain. Anyone can use Oasis to trade tokens, borrow against them, and earn savings using Dai.
landing_page.answer2: Dai is the world’s first unbiased currency and leading decentralized stablecoin soft-pegged to the US Dollar. Learn more about Dai {0}.
landing_page.answer3: You do not need an account to use Oasis. However, you will need an Ethereum wallet. Oasis supports most Ethereum browser wallets such as {0}, {1}, etc.
landing_page.question4: When will Borrow and Save be available?
landing_page.answer4: Borrow and Save will be released with the launch of Multi-Collateral Dai. Track Multi-Collateral Dai progress {0}.
landing_page.answer5: Security is our top priority. The Oasis team regularly conducts audits on our smart contracts. In addition, the Oasis code is {0}, giving the community the ability to pressure test and audit the core technology.
landing_page.question6: Will I be charged a fee to use Oasis?
landing_page.answer6: Oasis is free to use. However, you will have to pay gas and other fees associated with the Maker Protocol, such as Stability Fees.
landing_page.question7: How can I contact the Oasis team?
landing_page.answer7: You can reach the Oasis team by contacting us on {0}.
landing_page.question8: Can I buy Bitcoin or Ethereum on Oasis using a credit card or via my bank account?
landing_page.answer8: You cannot buy crypto from your bank account using Oasis. Instead, you can use Dai to buy Ethereum and other supported tokens.

overview_page.title: Overview
overview_page.get_started_title: Open your first vault to start generating Dai.

cdp_create.select_text: Each collateral type has its own risk parameters. You can lock up additional collateral types later.
cdp_create.setup_proxy_proxy_text: Setting up your vault will bundle multiple transactions into one, saving transaction time and gas costs. This only has to be done once.
cdp_create.setup_proxy_allowance_text: This permission allows Maker smart contracts to interact with your {0}. This has to be done once for each new collateral type.
cdp_create.deposit_text: Different collateral types have different risk parameters and collateralization ratios.
cdp_create.deposit_form_field1_title: How much {0} would you like to lock in your CDP?
cdp_create.deposit_form_field1_text: The amount of {0} you lock up determines how much Dai you can generate.
cdp_create.deposit_form_field2_title: What target collateralization ratio would you like to stay above?
cdp_create.deposit_form_field2_text: If your cdp drops below this target it will be considered {0} risk.
cdp_create.deposit_form_field3_title: How much DAI would you like to generate?
cdp_create.deposit_form_field3_text: You should generate an amount that is safely above the liquidation ratio.
cdp_create.confirmed_text: The estimated time is {0}. You can safely leave this page.
cdp_create.post_confirmed_text: You can safely leave this page.
cdp_create.proxy_text: Before creating your first CDP, you must create a personal proxy contract.
cdp_create.stability_fee_description: The fee calculated based on the outstanding debt of your vault. This is continuously added to your existing debt.
cdp_create.liquidation_ratio_description: The collateral-to-dai ratio at which the vault becomes vulnerable to liquidation.
cdp_create.liquidation_penalty_description: The fee that is added to the total outstanding DAI debt when a liquidation occurs.
cdp_create.waiting_for_confirmations_info: Waiting for confirmations reduces the risk of your Maker Collateral Vault address changing. We require users to wait 10 block confirmations to ensure it's been created successfully. This will often take around 2 minutes.
cdp_create.proxy_failure_not_mined: This transaction is taking longer than usual...
cdp_create.proxy_failure_not_mined_info: Transactions to the network may sometimes take longer than expected. This can be for a variety of reasons but may be due to a congested network or a transaction sent with a low gas price. Some wallets enable users to resend a transaction with a higher gas price, otherwise check for your transaction on etherscan and come back again later

cdp_migrate.select_text: Select a CDP and pay back the stability fee in DAI or MKR to migrate it to Multi-collateral Dai and the new CDP Portal.
cdp_migrate.trust_site_with_dai: Trust this site with my DAI
cdp_migrate.migrate_in_progress_text: The estimated time is 8 minutes. You can safely leave this page and return.
cdp_migrate.migrate_complete_text: CDP #{0} has been successfully migrated to Multi-collateral Dai and the new CDP Portal.

dsr_deposit.setup_proxy_text: Setting up your vault will bundle multiple transactions into one, saving transaction time and gas costs. This only has to be done once.
